product.name: Mineral Fusion Eye Pencil
product.description: Exceptionally rich, the mineral color of Mineral Fusion Eye Pencils glide on smoothly to line, define and enhance eyes. Formulated with Chamomile, Meadowfoam and Vitamin E to soothe delicate skin around eyes. Free of Gluten, Parabens, Artificial Colors, Fragrances and Talc. Never-tested on animals. Hypo-allergenic.Ingredients: Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Butter, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Cottonseed Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Oil, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Glyceryl Caprylate, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Ascorbyl Palmitate (Vitamin C), Iron Oxides (77491, 77492, 77499), Titanium Dioxide (77891), Mica (77019). Free of Gluten, Parabens, Artificial Colors, Fragrances and Talc. Never-tested on animals. Hypo-allergenic.
